lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Rostenkowski suggested that about 18 billion dlrs of new taxes might have to be found, along with nine billion in defence and spending cuts and another nine billion in domestic spending reductions.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Rostenkowski, an Illinois Democrat, also told the Futures Industry Association that he did not think congressional tax writers would approve a tax on stock transfers or ease taxes to promote U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Rostenkowski said he hoped White House Chief of Staff Howard Baker could persuade President Reagan to support a package of tax increases and spending cuts.
